Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the ceria-samaria (CeO2-Sm2O3) system is higher than that of yttria-stabilized zirconia and other CeO2-based oxides.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, a small amount of alkali-element doped CeO2-Sm2O3 solid solution was prepared.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This solid solution was characterized by measuring the powder density and the chemical composition.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, its electrochemical properties were investigated in the temperature range from 700 degrees to 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that a small amount of alkali-element-doped CeO2 solid solution enhanced the ionic conductivity, The power density of an oxygen-hydrogen fuel cell for alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 ceramics exhibited high values at low temperatures such as 700 degrees to 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is concluded that the improved fuel cell performance can be attributed to the high stability of this composition in the fuel atmosphere.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells
